title: I have more fun trolling than actually playing the game.
body: Not even exaggerating, I enjoy it so much, like when you throw and the team rages and you're just laughing, make my day.

replies.body:
If you enjoy trolling and ruining other people's day, just play you know, GTA?

Where you can troll to your heart's content with 0 consequences.
Keep doing the lord's work OP

> [{quoted}](name=Corki did 911,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=B5wPbc3P,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-06-05T01:46:22.043+0000)
>
> Keep doing the lord's work OP

The Dark Lord will rise again.
pls man don't make posts about this. People will spam shit in the comments about how shit you are and how you need to kill yourself. Just pls dont.
